sentence.idiomatic: After his death all of his properties belong to his son.
I'm not responsible for this matter, it's useless coming to me.
Until we find the new manager, responsibility for managing the production department will belong to you.
I’ve heard that he has recently founded an internet company in Beijing.
This organization also established an office in Europe to oversee public relations.
He established a scholarship to help students in economic difficulties at his alma mater.
After going through the reforms, this state-owned enterprise still has state-owned capital holdings.
This group put up one billion yuan to have direct holdings in a high-class television manufacturing business.
After these two companies merged, who will have the holdings?
In the factory, the younger brother is the boss, the elder brother is the employee. Their relationship is an employer and employee relationship.
If the employee is injured while working, the employer must pay compensation.
This company supplies the employment of a housekeeping service.
In order to play the role of a blind person well, he personally entered into the life of a blind person.
In the wake of going thoroughly into the research, the scientists believe that living creatures exist outside of the earth.
Following thorough discussion, even more problems are certain to appear.
In the past few years this area has used natural scenery to vigorously develop the tourism industry.
In order to control the market, this company decided to vigorously strengthen new product development.
Without the vigorous support of our government, our school could never have developed so well.
The experts forecast that this city’s housing prices in this year will present a rising trend.
The past few months his support level rate has assumed a steep decline.
In this period of time the luxury car market demand presented a small range increase trend.
In this aspect he is very accomplished. If you have an opportunity you can consult him.

word.literal: to start from the very beginning

sentence.idiomatic: If you want to obtain certain achievements in a management aspect, you had better start studying from scratch.
He is the emperor in Chinese history with the most achievements.
In the wake of technological developments, the aviation profession has entered into a flourishing age of development.
The flourishing development of environmental protection products is beneficial to our protecting the environment even better.
Since when has the tourism industry begun to prosper vigorously everywhere?
There are just too many different types of enterprises in China. How can I ever keep them straight?

Exactly. Speaking about the larger ones, Chinese enterprises can be broken down into these categories: domestically invested, Hong Kong, Macau or Taiwan invested, and foreign invested—any of these major categories. Each of these major categories can also be further divided up into many smaller categories.

word.literal: to start from the very beginning

sentence.idiomatic: Yikes, don’t break them down yet. How about you start from the beginning again and explain them to me. Let’s first talk about domestically invested enterprises, how about that?

All right. Speaking of domestically invested enterprises, actually the state-owned enterprises and privately-owned enterprises we frequently hear about belong to this category. Oh, do you know what state-owned enterprises refer to?
I’m not really clear on that, but I do often hear news about state-owned enterprise reform.
Then I will explain to you what state-owned enterprise refers to. A state-owned enterprise is just a business where all the capital belongs to the state economic system.
Oh, so that’s how it is. I see, I see. So, what about privately-owned enterprises?
That refers to enterprises established and invested in by citizens, or held by citizens, which are based on wage labor profit-earning economic organization.
So in China, in comparison which are there more of: state-owned enterprises or privately-owned enterprises?

Now it’s about the same. But, in the past, China’s enterprises were almost all state-owned. In the last ten years or so, in the wake of China entering into economic system reform, there have been more and more privately-owned enterprises. Meanwhile, as the state has been vigorously pushing for state-owned enterprise reform, the number of state-owned enterprises has presented a large scale of decrease. However, on the other hand, their quality and actual strength have gone up a lot.

I’ve heard of this point before. Those Chinese enterprises that have been able to become Fortune 500 companies are all state-owned enterprises. But I also anticipate great things from China’s privately-owned enterprises. These past few years, privately-owned enterprises have not only developed rapidly, but have also been able to make outstanding achievements in different fields.
That’s right. It’s precisely because of state-owned and privately-owned enterprises’ vigorous development, that China’s economy has become so prosperous.

word.literal: Hong Kong, Macao and Taiwan capital
to penetrate into, to go deep into
